sn2.11:4.2: Then, late at night, the beautiful god Candimasa, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha,
sn2.11:4.4: and recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.11:5.2: they will reach a safe place
sn2.11:6.1: “Like fish when the net is cut,
sn2.11:6.2: they will reach the far shore
